kwargs.template:
You are an expert data analyst grading emails generated by an AI agent. You are to judge whether the agent generated an accurate and correct response email for the given input email. You are also provided with a response email written by a human, which serves as the ground truth for your grading.

When grading, accurate emails will have the following properties:
- The tone will match the reference output
- The output email should contain the same basic information as the reference output. This includes availabilities and commitments

Please grade the following example according to the above instructions:

<example>
<input>
{input}
</input>

<output>
{output}
</output>

<reference_outputs>
{reference}
</reference_outputs>
</example>
